import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import {Book} from "./dto/book"; import {HttpClient} from "@angular/common/http"; @Component({ selector: 'app-root', templateUrl: './app.component.html', styleUrls: ['./app.component.scss'] }) export class AppComponent { title = 'front-end'; bookList: Array = []; constructor(private httpClient:HttpClient) { httpClient.get>('http://localhost:8080/api/v1/books') } deleteBook() { } editBook() { } }
